snippet.title: FlotillaWWII trailer (graphics update)
snippet.description:
Flotilla WWII is an indie 2D naval TBS set in the pacific theater of WWII, submitted to Steam Greenlight and available on IndieDB (links below).

Flotilla WWII is the first naval game to allow both base building and combat on the same map, whereas previous titles were either tactical (no base building) or 4X (combat is fought on a separate map). Featured are:
-Map generator for 16x16 to 256x256 maps
-9 ship classes (from corvette to battleship and aircraft carrier)
-4 buildings (factory, port, airport, AA gun)
-4 aircraft (fighter, dive/scout/strategic bomber)
-PvAI and hotseat PvP
This trailer was made to illustrate the updated graphics which were created in response to community feedback, along with the release of the graphically updated version on IndieDB.
